name: A Roll Away
description:
Someone kicked the cosmic boards and all the tabletop pieces are spread across the multiverse! Now you have to get back to your board with your loyal companion, D-Dog. But beware, you are not the only one looking to get back to their boards...

Use D-Dog to travel across dimensions to find home, but be careful! Enemies will be waiting for you on the other side. Strategize around their positions when changing dimensions. Remember where they were so you can go back and smack them!

You can also throw D-Dog, rolling it to get access to buffs! However, as long as it's on the ground, you won't be able to travel to other dimensions - be careful!

Will you get home safe?

Kill all enemies in all 6 dimensions and roll D-Dog once more to get home!

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Shoot: Left click (can be held down)
  • Roll/Pick Up D-Dog: Right click / E
  • Change dimensions: Spacebar (while holding D-Dog!)
  • Pause the game: Escape

Hint: Time is being tracked - see how fast you can make it to the end screen!

Credits:

- Programming: Rodrigo Moreno

- Music: Ignacio Seret

- Art: Nicolás Uriel Navall
